price: ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߦߋ߫ ߏ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߯ ߡߎ߲߬ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
